title: Add contact email (callcraftaai@gmail.com) to the website contact info

requirements.text: Add the contact email address "callcraftaai@gmail.com" to the website’s contact information (in the Contact section and anywhere else contact details are presented, such as the footer), and make it clickable using a mailto: link.

quotes:
For contact use this email as well 
callcraftaai@gmail.com

acceptanceCriteria: The Contact section displays the email address exactly as: callcraftaai@gmail.com
Clicking/tapping the email opens the user’s email client via a mailto:callcraftaai@gmail.com link
If the site has a footer contact area, the same email is shown there as well
User-facing label text is in English (e.g., "Email"), and the email link is visually consistent with existing contact links (e.g., phone)

constraints: Frontend immutablePaths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
Do not route any contact behavior through the backend; this change is static UI only
Keep Motoko backend as-is unless explicitly required (backend/main.mo currently has no logic)
nonGoals: Building a lead-capture/contact form submission workflow
Adding any email-sending integration or backend storage
Changing the existing phone number contact behavior (tel: link for 9295019225)
